channel.title: Vox Populi
channel.itunes:author: Alison Randall
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Show by Atheists, for Atheists
channel.itunes:summary: Vox Populi is a bi-weekly show giving a voice to intelligent, opinionated atheists. On each episode they answer up to four questions on varied and interesting topics.

item.title: Episode 17 - July 27th, 2006
item.description: Topics : Disproof of God, Atheistic Evangelism, War, and Culture.

item.title: Episode 16 - June 19th 2006
item.description: Topics : Homosexuality and polygamy, liberals and science, social groups, and suicide.

item.title: Episode 15 - July 1st 2006
item.description: Topics : Consumeurism, religious hypocrisy, the evidence against God, and human blood sports.

item.title: Episode 14 - June 19th 2006
item.description: Topics : A hypothetical scenario on death, artificial intelligence, religious charity, and superstition.

item.title: Episode 13 - June 4th 2006
item.description: Special edition on moral theory. Topics : Nobility, progress, the demeaning doctrine of Christianity, and "loving your enemies".

item.title: Episode 12 - May 22nd 2006
item.description: Special edition on political issues. Topics : political issues, more specifically the morality of human nature, abortion, the Pledge of Allegiance, and the age of consent.

item.title: Episode 11 - May 9th 2006
item.description: Special edition on engaging believers. Topics : spirituality and rituals, Christian fundamentalism, overreacting to religion, ignorance vs stupidity.

item.title: Episode 8 - March 25th 2006
item.description: Topics : Absolute truth, the consilience of science and religion, beastiality and ex-atheists.

item.title: Episode 7 - March 12th 2006
item.description: Topics : The search for purpose and meaning, beauty and complexity, the fallibility of science, and the appeal to ignorance.

item.title: Episode 6 - February 25th 2006
item.description: Topics : The limits of human knowledge, faith and hope, rationalizations of believers, popular distrust of science.

item.title: Episode 5 - February 12th 2006
item.description: Topics : The moral status of believers, religious indoctrination, marriage, Christian friends.

item.title: Episode 3 - January 15th 2006
item.description: Topics : Moral duty, the Internet, existence of God, heroism and heroes.

item.title: Episode 2 - December 31st 2005
item.description: Questions revolving around Christmas and New Year

item.title: Episode 1 - December 17th 2005
item.description: Topics : Atheism, Santa Claus, people who pray for you, and eliminating religion.
